keys.alt: Improve knowledge of your tree heritage
keys.title: Improve knowledge of your tree heritage
keys.description: Thanks to ecoTeka, import your inventory, add your trees on the map, visualize your heritage, and share it with your elected representatives

keys.title: Optimize management for healthy trees
keys.description: Plan, log and track the deployment of your interventions with our integrated management tool.

keys.title: Rethinking nature in the city
keys.description: Ecoteka accompanies you to a greener city by helping you make the right choices for your city and your fellow citizens.

reference.title: Manon Fr√©dout, Community developer
reference.content: "Today, I have a role in the biodiversity and urban ecosystems community of Natural Solutions. I can apply my know-how learned during my landscape's studies and I can especially unite people around projects to better imagine the world and the city of tomorrow. I want to bring people together so that there is an exchange of knowledge and skills. Everyone will be able to bring their little seed to the green cities that we are building."

hero.title: Let's take care of the city trees
hero.body: With ecoTeka, inventory, manage and log all trees data in the city.
